Access server: code|lang=php|1=$link = mysql_connect(host  user  password); or code|lang=php|1=$db = new mysqli(host  user  password); or code|lang=php|1=$db = new PDO('mysqlhost=hostname;dbname=dbname'  'username'  'password');
Use database: code|lang=php|1=mysql_select_db(name  $link); or code|lang=php|1=$db = new mysqli(host  user  password  name); or code|lang=php|1=$db>select_db(name);

Access server: sxhl|lang=python|1=db = MySQLdbconnect(      host="hostname"        user="username"        passwd="password"        db="dbname"        connect_timeout=5)
